schemas.name: root
schemas.description: Metadata applicable to all data elements.

fields.name: reported_date
fields.description: The date or date-time the observation is reported.

fields.name: reporter_organization_id
fields.description: The identifier of the organization reporting.
fields.notes: Either the reporting organization or the practitioner should be provided.

fields.name: reporter_practitioner_id
fields.description: The identifier of the practitioner reporting.
fields.notes: Either the reporting organization or the practitioner should be provided.

schemas.name: patient
schemas.description: The collection of data elements with demographic information about a patient.

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier assigned to the patient.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.identifier, PCORnet: Demographics.patid, OHDSI CDM: Person.person_id, Sentinel: Demographic.PatID

fields.name: date_of_birth
fields.description: The actual or approximate date of birth.
fields.note:: FHIR: Patient.birthDate, PCORnet: Demographics.birth_date, Demographics.birth_time, OHDSI CDM: Person.year_of_birth, Person.month_of_birth, Person.day_of_birth, Person.birth_datetime, Sentinel: Demographic.Birth-Date, I2B2: Demographics.birth_date

fields.name: administrative_gender
fields.description: The gender that the patient is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.
fields.notes: Codes must align with FHIR Administrative Gender value set (http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender). FHIR: Patient.gender, OHDSI CDM: Person.gender_concept_id, PCORnet: Demographics.sex, Sentinel: Demographic.Sex, I2B2: Demographics.sex

fields.name: race
fields.description: Concepts classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing common history, traits, geographical origin or nationality. The race codes used to represent these concepts are based upon the CDC Race and Ethnicity Code Set Version 1.0.

codeList: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

fields.notes: Codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/omb-race-category. FHIR: Patient.extension: us-core-race, PCORnet: Demographics.race, OHDSI CDM: Person.race_concept_id, Sentinel: Demographic.Race, I2B2: Demographics.Race

fields.name: ethnicity
fields.description: Concepts classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing common history, traits, geographical origin or nationality. The ethnicity codes used to represent these concepts are based upon the CDC Race and Ethnicity Code Set Version 1.0.
fields.notes: Codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/omb-ethnicity-category. FHIR: Patient.extension: us-core-ethnicity, PCORnet: Demographics.hispanic, OHDSI CDM: Person.ethnicity_concept_id, Sentinel: Demographic.Hispanic, I2B2: Demographics.Hispanic

fields.name: zip_code
fields.description: Zip code of the primary residence of the patient.
fields.notes: Five digit zip code is acceptable. FHIR: Patient.address, OHDSI CDM: Person.location_id, Sentinel: Demographic.Zip

schemas.name: Vital_status
schemas.description: An indicator of whether the patient is alive or dead.

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the patient.
fields.notes: FHIR: AdverseEvent.subject, PCORnet: Death.patid, Death_cause.patid, OHDSI CDM: Death.person_id

fields.name: vital_status
fields.description: Donor's last known state of living or deceased.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.deceasedBoolean, PCORnet: Death.patid, Death_cause.patid, OHDSI CDM: DEATH.person_id (deprecated in CDM 6.0), VISIT_DETAIL.DISCHARGE_TO_CONCEPT_ID = 4216643 'Patient died', OBSERVATION_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID = 44818516 (EHR discharge status 'Expired').

fields.name: cause_of_death
fields.description: Indicates the cause of a patient's death.
fields.notes: Cause of death is only required to be submitted if the patient is deceased. Mortality coding of COVID-19 with ICD-10 see: https://www.who.int/classifications/icd/COVID-19-coding-icd10.pdf?ua=1. FHIR: VRDR Cause of Death Condition profile; FHIR: AdverseEvent.suspectedEntity.causality.Extension (Proposed Name: cause-code : CodeableConcept), PCORnet: Death_cause.death_cause, Death_cause.death_cause_code, OHDSI CDM: Death.death_type_concept_id, Death.cause_concept_id.

fields.name: date_of_death
fields.description: Indicates the actual or approximate date of a patient's death.
fields.notes: Date of death is only required to be submitted if the patient is deceased. FHIR: Patient.deceasedDateTime, VRDR Death Date profile, AdverseEvent.date, PCORnet: Death.death_date, OHDSI CDM: Death.death_date

schemas.name: patient_PII
schemas.description: Personally identifiable information about a patient.

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the patient.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.identifier, PCORnet: Demographics.patid, OHDSI CDM: Person.person_id, Sentinel: Demographic.PatID

fields.name: family_name
fields.description: The part of a name that links to the genealogy.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.name.family. Patient PII not reported in other systems.

fields.name: given_name(s)
fields.description: Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.name.given. Patient PII not reported in other systems.

fields.name: address_line
fields.description: This component contains the house number, apartment number, street name, street direction, P.O. Box number, delivery hints, and similar address information.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.address.line. Patient PII not reported in other systems.

fields.name: address_city
fields.description: The name of the city, town, suburb, village or other community or delivery center.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.address.city. Patient PII not reported in other systems.

fields.name: address_state
fields.description: US 2 letter state code.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.address.state. Patient PII not reported in other systems.

fields.name: primary_phone_number
fields.description: Preferred phone number for the patient.
fields.notes: FHIR: Patient.contact.telecom. Patient PII not reported in other systems.

schemas.name: condition
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a condition. A condition can be either a diagnosis or part of an ongoing problem list.

fields.name: condition_id
fields.description: Unique identifier assigned to this instance of condition in the patient.
fields.notes: FHIR: Condition.id, PCORnet: Diagnosis.diagnosisid, Condition.conditionid, OHDSI CDM: Condition_occurrence.condition_occurrence_id

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the patient.
fields.notes: FHIR: Condition.subject, PCORnet: Diagnosis.patid, Condition.patid, OHDSI CDM: Condition_occurrence.person_id

fields.name: code
fields.description: The code to represent the condition, diagnosis or problem.
fields.notes: This field accepts either ICD-10-CM or SNOMED-CT disorder codes. FHIR: Condition.code, PCORnet: Diagnosis.dx, Diagnosis.dx_type, Condition.condition, Condition.condition_type, OHDSI CDM: Condition_occurrence.condition_concept_id, I2B2: Diagnosis.DIAGNOSIS_CODE, Diagnosis.DIAGNOSIS_CODING_SYSTEM, Diagnosis.DIAGNOSIS_CODING_SYSTEM_VERSION.

fields.name: category
fields.description: Condition category which distinguishes between a diagnosis or a problem.
fields.notes: Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/condition-category. FHIR: Condition.category, I2B2: Diagnosis.DIAGNOSIS_SOURCE

fields.name: recorded_date
fields.description: The date that the condition was recorded.
fields.notes: This is different from the condition onset date which could be a period of time prior to the date recorded by the provider. FHIR: Condition.recordedDate, PCORnet: Condition.report_date

fields.name: onset_date
fields.description: An estimate or actual date that the patient reported experiencing the condition.
fields.notes: FHIR: Condition.onsetDateTime, PCORnet: Condition.onset_date, I2B2: Diagnosis.DIAGNOSIS_DATE

fields.name: verification_date
fields.description: Date when condition was confirmed by positive test, imaging, biopsy, or other method.
fields.notes: TBD

fields.name: clinical_status
fields.description: The clinical status of the condition. (Reference source: FHIR Condition clinical status from http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-definitions.html#Condition.clinicalStatus).
fields.notes: The clinical status terms are described at http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-condition-clinical.html. FHIR: Condition.clinicalStatus, PCORnet: Condition.condition_status, OHDSI CDM: Condition_occurrence.condition_status_concept_id

schemas.name: med_exposure
schemas.description: An instance of a medication or substance introduced into the body. Medication exposures are indicated by a variety of records: medication orders, medication administrations, medication lists, and patient-reported medication statements.

fields.name: med_id
fields.description: Unique identifier assigned to the medication exposure episode.

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the patient.

fields.name: code
fields.description: The code to represent the medication that was administered.
fields.notes: Medications can be reported in NDC or RxNorm. For NDC, the product code or package code is acceptable. For RxNorm, the ingredient  (IN) or multiple ingredient (MIN) codes are preferred over the brand codes or combination (Ingredient + Strength (SCDC), Ingredient + Dose Form (SCDF), etc.). FHIR: MedicationDispense.medicationCodeableConcept, MedicationRequest.medicationCodeableConcept, MedicationStatement.medicationCodeableConcept, PCORnet: Prescribing.rxnorm_cui, OHDSI CDM: Drug_exposure.drug_concept_id, Drug_exposure.drug_type_concept_id, I2B2: Medication.MEDICATION_ CLASSIFICATION_SYSTEM, Medication.MEDICATION_ CODING_SYSTEM, Medication.MEDICATION_ CLASSIFICATION_SYSTEM_VERSION, Medication.MEDICATION_ CLASSIFICATION_SYSTEM, Medication.MEDICATION_CODE, Medication.MEDICATION_CODING_SYSTEM_VERSION, Medication.RAW_ MEDICATION_CODE

fields.name: med_dose_quantity
fields.description: The amount of the medication given at one administration event.
fields.notes: FHIR: MedicationRequest(MedicationDispense).dosageInstruction.doseAndRate.dose[x], MedicationStatement.dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x], PCORnet: Prescribing.rx_dose_form, Prescribing.rx_dose_ordered, Prescribing.rx_dose_ordered_unit, OHDSI CDM: Drug_exposure.quantity

fields.name: med_dose_units
fields.description: Unit of measure for the dose quantity of the administered medication.
fields.notes: Nomenclature conforms to the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM): https://unitsofmeasure.org/trac. FHIR: MedicationRequest(MedicationDispense).dosageInstruction.doseAndRate.doseQuantity.system/code, PCORNet: Prescribing.rx._dose_ordered_unit

fields.name: med_route
fields.description: The path of the substance into the body for the administered medication.

codeList: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct  where concept is-a 284009009 (Route of administration values)

fields.notes: FHIR: MedicationDispense(MedicationRequest).dosageInstruction.route, PCORnet: Dispensing.dispense_route, PCORnet: Prescribing.rx_route, OHDSI CDM: Drug_exposure.route_concept_id, I2B2: Medication.RAW_MEDICATION_ROUTE

fields.name: med_frequency
fields.description: The timing for the frequency that the medication was taken.
fields.notes: Frequency should be reported as a string instead of a complex data structure to simplify the collection of data. FHIR: MedicationRequest.dosageInstruction.timing, PCORnet: Prescribing.rx_frequency

fields.name: med_start_date
fields.description: The date when the medication was started.
fields.notes: FHIR: MedicationDispense.whenHandedOver, MedicationStatement.effectivePeriod.start, PCORnet: Dispensing.dispense_date, OHDSI CDM: Drug_exposure.drug_exposure_start_date, Drug_exposure.drug_exposure_start_datetime

fields.name: med_stop_date
fields.description: The date when the medication as administered to the patient.
fields.notes: If the stop date is not provided, it is assumed the medication is ongoing at the time of the report. FHIR: MedicationStatement.effectivePeriod.end, OHDSI CDM: Drug_exposure.drug_exposure_end_date, Drug_exposure.drug_exposure_end_datetime. May be calculated from FHIR: MedicationStatement.basedOn(MedicationRequest).dispenseRequest.expectedSupplyDuration, OHDSI CDM: Drug_exposure.days_supply

schemas.name: procedure
schemas.description: An action that was performed on or for a patient. This can be a physical intervention like an operation, or less invasive services such as counseling.

fields.name: procedure_id
fields.description: Unique identifier assigned to the procedure occurrence.
fields.notes: FHIR: Procedure.id, PCORnet: Procedures.proceduresid, OHDSI CDM: Device_exposure.device_exposure_id, Procedure_occurrence.procedure_occurrence_id

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the patient.

fields.name: code
fields.description: The code representing the procedure. A procedure is an action performed on a patient, including diagnostic tests, therapies - such as respiratory therapy, surgeries, and other clinical interventions.
fields.notes: SNOMED CT (preferred), ICD-10-CM (preferred) or HCPCS (alternative). FHIR: Procedure.code, PCORnet: Procedures.px, Procedures.px_type, OHDSI CDM: Procedure_occurrence.procedure_concept_id, I2B2: Procedure.PROCEDURE_ CODING_SYSTEM, Procedure.PROCEDURE_CODE, Procedure.PROCEDURE_CODING_SYSTEM_VERSION

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the procedure in terms of workflow.

fields.name: start_date
fields.description: The date and time the procedure started.
fields.notes: FHIR: Procedure.performedDateTime, Procedure.performedPeriod.start, PCORnet: Procedures.px_date, OHDSI CDM: Procedure_occurrence.procedure_date, Procedure_occurrence.procedure_datetime, I2B2: Procedure.PROCEDURE_DATE

fields.name: end_date
fields.description: The date and time the procedure ended.
fields.notes: FHIR: Procedure.performedPeriod.end, OHDSI CDM: Device_exposure.device_exposure_end_date, Device_exposure.device_exposure_end_datetime

schemas.name: lab_result
schemas.description: An individual laboratory test and result value

fields.name: lab_result_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the lab test.
fields.notes: FHIR: Observation.id, PCORnet: Lab_result_cm.lab_result_cm_id, OHDSI CDM: Measurement.measurement_id, Observation.observation_id

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the patient.
fields.notes: FHIR: Observation.subject, PCORnet: Vital.patid, Lab_result_cm.patid, OHDSI CDM: Measurement.person_id, Observation.person_id

fields.name: code
fields.description: The code identifying the type of lab test performed.
fields.notes: LOINC is preferred as the coding system for the lab test. In cases where there is a no LOINC code immediately available, a local test code would be accepted provided that there is a code system listing where the code originated. FHIR: Observation.code, PCORnet: Lab_result_cm.lab_loinc, Lab_result_cm.raw_lab_name, OHDSI CDM: Measurement.measurement_concept_id, Observation.observation_concept_id, I2B2: Laboratory_test.RAW_PANEL, Laboratory_test.LAB_ CLASSIFICATION _SYSTEM_VERSION, Laboratory_test.LAB_ CLASSIFICATION_SYSTEM, Laboratory_test.LAB_ CODING_SYSTEM, Laboratory_test.LAB_CODE, Laboratory_test.LAB_CODING_SYSTEM_VERSION, Laboratory_test.RAW_LAB_CODE

fields.name: relevant_dateTime
fields.description: The date or dateTime when the specimen was collected.
fields.notes: FHIR: Observation.effectiveDateTime, Observation.basedOn(ServiceRequest).occurrenceDateTime, PCORnet: Lab_result_cm.lab_order_date, OHDSI CDM: Measurement.measurement_date, Measurement.measurement_datetime, Observation.observation_date, Observation.observation_datetime

fields.name: result_dateTime
fields.description: The date or dateTime when the result was reported.
fields.notes: FHIR: Observation.issued, PCORnet: Lab_result_cm.result_date, Lab_result_cm.result_time

fields.name: result_code
fields.description: The value associated with a lab result, represented as a code.
fields.notes: FHIR: Observation.valueCodeableConcept, PCORnet: Lab_result_cm.result_snomed, OHDSI CDM: Measurement.value_as_concept_id, Observation.value_as_concept_id, I2B2: Laboratory_test.RESULT_QUALITATIVE

fields.name: result_quantity
fields.description: The value associated with a lab result, represented as a number. The number can be either an integer or a float.
fields.notes: FHIR: Observation.valueQuantity, PCORnet: Lab_result_cm.result_qual, Lab_result_cm.result_num, Lab_result_cm.result_modifier,Lab_result_cm.raw_result, Measurement.value_as_number, Observation.value_as_number, I2B2: Laboratory_test.RAW_RESULT, Laboratory_test.RESULT_MODIFIER, Laboratory_test.RESULT_NUMERICAL

fields.name: result_units
fields.description: Unit of measure for the associated with the lab result quantity.
fields.notes: Nomenclature conforms to the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM): https://unitsofmeasure.org/trac. FHIR: Observation.valueQuantity.system/codes PCORnet: Lab_result_cm.result_unit, OHDSI CDM: Measurement.unit_concept_id, I2B2: Laboratory_test.RAW_UNIT, Laboratory_test.RESULT_UNIT

fields.name: lab_result_interpretation
fields.description: An interpretation associated with the lab test result

codeList: Any of the codes specified in the http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation value set.

fields.notes: FHIR: Observation.interpretation, PCORnet: Lab_result_cm.abn_ind, I2B2: Laboratory_test.ABNORMAL_RESULT_INDICATOR

schemas.name: encounter
schemas.description: Data elements associated with an encounter at a health care facility, such as an ambulatory visit, an emergency department visit, or a hospitalization.

fields.name: encounter_id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the encounter.
fields.notes: FHIR: Encounter.id, PCORnet: Encounter.encounterid, OHDSI CDM: Visit_occurrence.visit_occurrence_id, Sentinel: Encounter.EncounterID

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the patient.
fields.notes: FHIR: Encounter.subject, PCORnet: Encounter.patid, OHDSI CDM: Visit_occurrence.person_id, Sentinel: Encounter.PatID

fields.name: facility_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the facility providing the encounter.
fields.notes: FHIR: Location.id, OHDSI CDM: Care_site.care_site_id, Location.location_id

fields.name: encounter_class
fields.description: A classification of the encounter, e.g. ambulatory, emergency or inpatient
fields.notes: Permissible values descriptions are available at http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActEncounterCode/vs.html. FHIR: Encounter.class, PCORnet: Encounter.enc_type, Sentinel: Encounter.EncType, I2B2: Procedure.VISIT.VISIT_TYPE

fields.name: admission_date
fields.description: The date the patient was admitted for the encounter
fields.notes: FHIR: Encounter.period.start, PCORnet: Encounter.admit_date, Encounter.admit_time, OHDSI CDM: Visit_occurrence.visit_start_date, Visit_occurrence.visit_start_datetime, Sentinel: Encounter.ADATE, I2B2: Procedure.VISIT.ADMIT_DATE

fields.name: admission_source
fields.description: The type of location the patient originated from.

codeList: Any of the codes specified in the http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/admit-source value set

fields.notes: Definitions for the permissible values are available at http://hl7.org/fhir/codesystem-encounter-admit-source.html. FHIR: Encounter.hospitalization.admitSource or Encounter.hospitalization.origin(location).type, PCORnet: Encounter.admitting_source, OHDSI CDM: Visit_occurrence.admitting_source_concept_id, Sentinel: Encounter.Admitting_Source

fields.name: discharge_date
fields.description: The date the patient was discharged from the encounter
fields.notes: FHIR: Encounter.period.end, PCORnet: Encounter.discharge_date, Encounter.discharge_time, OHDSI CDM: Visit_occurrence.visit_end_date, Visit_occurrence.visit_end_datetime, Sentinel: Encounter.DDATE, I2B2: Procedure.VISIT.DISCHARGE_DATE

fields.name: discharge_disposition
fields.description: Categorization of the status of the patient at discharge according to the type of location the patient was discharged to.
fields.notes: Definitions for the permissible values are available at https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-encounter-discharge-disposition.html. FHIR: Encounter.extension (Proposed Name: discharge-disposition: CodeableConcept), PCORnet: Encounter.discharge_disposition, Sentinel: Encounter.Discharge_Disposition

fields.name: initial_diagnosis
fields.description: The initial working diagnosis (also known as 'chief complaint') first entered into the EHR
fields.notes: FHIR: Encounter.diagnosis.condition (Role = CC), OHDSI CDM: Condition_occurrence with condition_status_concept_id = 4033240,   PCORnet: DIAGNOSIS.DX_SOURCE (IN)

fields.name: admitting_diagnosis
fields.description: The main diagnosis code used to admit the patient.
fields.notes: An admitting diagnosis is only expected to be available for inpatient encounters. FHIR: Encounter.diagnosis.condition (Role = AD),OHDSI CDM: Condition_occurrence with condition_status_concept_id = 4203942, PCORnet: DIAGNOSIS with DX_SOURCE=AD

fields.name: discharge_diagnosis
fields.description: The final diagnosis determined to be the main cause for the hospitalization after all testing, surgery, and workup are complete.
fields.notes: Discharge diagnosis is only expected to be available for inpatient encounters that have been completed. FHIR: Encounter.diagnosis.condition (Role = DD), OHDSI CDM: Condition_occurrence with condition_status_concept_id = 4230359, PCORnet: DIAGNOSIS with DX_SOURCE=DI

schemas.name: encounter_detail
schemas.description: Department, unit or setting the patient visits during the course of an inpatient encounter, such as emergency department or intensive care unit.

fields.name: encounter_id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the encounter.
fields.notes: OHDSI CDM: visit_detail_parent_id

fields.name: encounter_detail_id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the instance of encounter setting.
fields.notes: OHDSI CDM: visit_detail_id

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of setting according to its function/purpose
fields.notes: Definitions for the permissible values for setting type are available at http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType/vs.html. OHDSI CDM: visit_detail_type_concept_id

fields.name: arrival_date
fields.description: The date the patient arrived at the setting.
fields.notes: OHDSI CDM: visit_detail_start_date, visit_detail_start_datetime

fields.name: departure_date
fields.description: The date the patient departed the setting.
fields.notes: OHDSI CDM: visit_detail_end_date, visit_detail_end_datetime

fields.name: length of stay
fields.description: The length of time a patient spent in the setting.
fields.notes: Can be derived from arrival and departure dates.

schemas.name: patient_observation
schemas.description: Clinical information obtained through examination, assessment, survey, or questioning, including vital signs.

fields.name: observation_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the observation.
fields.note: FHIR: Observation.id, PCORnet: Vital.vitalid, Lab_result_cm.lab_result_cm_id, OMOP: Measurement.measurement_id, Observation.observation_id

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the patient.
fields.note: FHIR: Observation.subject, PCORnet: Vital.patid, Lab_result_cm.patid, OMOP: Measurement.person_id, Observation.person_id

fields.name: code
fields.description: The code identifying the type of observation.
fields.notes: LOINC is preferred as the coding system for the observation. In cases where there is a no LOINC code immediately available, a local test code would be accepted provided that there is a code system listing where the code originated. FHIR: Observation.code, PCORnet: specific VITAL table elements, PRO_CM: CM_LOINC, OHDSI CDM: Measurement.measurement_concept_id, Observation.observation_concept_id

fields.name: observation_datetime
fields.description: The date-time of the observation, if the observation is made at a specific time.
fields.notes: Either the observation_datetime or the observation_period_start should be reported, but not both. FHIR: Observation.effectiveDateTime.start, PCORnet: Vital.measure_date, Vital.measure_time, OMOP: Measurement.measurement_date, Measurement.measurement_datetime, Observation.observation_date, Observation.observation_datetime

fields.name: observation_period_start
fields.description: The date or date-time marking the beginning of the clinically-relevant time period of the observation.
fields.notes: Either the observation_datetime or the observation_period_start should be reported, but not both.

fields.name: observation_period_end
fields.description: The date or date-time marking end of the observation period. If the observation_period_start is reported and the observation_period_end is not reported, the observation is assumed to be ongoing at the time of reporting.

fields.name: result_string
fields.description: The value associated with the observation, represented as a text.
fields.notes: A textual description of the observation result. A code is preferred if available.

fields.name: result_code
fields.description: The value associated with the observation, represented as a code.
fields.note: FHIR: Observation.valueCodeableConcept, PCORnet: Vital.ht, Vital.wt, Vital.systolic, Vital.original_bmi, Vital.smoking, Vital.tobacco, Vital.tobacco_type

fields.name: result_quantity
fields.description: The value associated with a lab result, represented as a number. The number can be either an integer or a float.
fields.note: FHIR: Observation.valueQuantity, PCORnet: Vital.ht, Vital.wt, Vital.systolic, Vital.original_bmi

fields.name: result_units
fields.description: Unit of measure for the associated with the lab result quantity.
fields.notes: Nomenclature conforms to the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM): https://unitsofmeasure.org/trac. FHIR: Observation.valueQuantity.system/codes PCORnet: OHDSI CDM: Measurement.unit_concept_id

fields.name: result_interpretation
fields.description: An interpretation associated with the observation

codeList: Any of the codes specified in the http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation value set.

fields.notes: FHIR: Observation.interpretation

schemas.name: group
schemas.description: A specific sub-population or cohort with common characteristics.

fields.name: group_id
fields.description: The id of the group definition.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A narrative explanation of the composition of the group.

fields.name: managing_organization_id
fields.description: The lead organization responsible for the group.

fields.name: managing_practitioner_id
fields.description: The lead practitioner responsible for the group.

schemas.name: group_member
schemas.description: A specific sub-population or cohort with common characteristics.

fields.name: group_member_id
fields.description: Unique identifier assigned to patient in the context of the group or cohort, for example,

fields.name: patient_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the person included in the group.
fields.notes: Including the patient_id does not imply PII of the patient is revealed.

fields.name: group_id
fields.description: The id of the group definition.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A narrative explanation of the composition of the group.

fields.name: member_start_date
fields.description: The date when the member was included in the group.

fields.name: member_end_date
fields.description: The date when the member no longer was included in the group.
fields.notes: If no end date is given, it is assumed the person is still a member of the group on the report date.

schemas.name: facility
schemas.description: An institution (physical or organizational) where healthcare is delivered.

fields.name: facility_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the facility.

fields.name: facility_name
fields.description: Name of the facility.

fields.name: location_id
fields.description: Identifier of the physical location of the facility.

schemas.name: measure_result
schemas.description: A result of measuring a characteristic of the group, facility, organization, or jurisdiction.

fields.name: measure_result_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the measure instance.

fields.name: measure_id
fields.description: A code or identifier of the definition of measure reported.
fields.notes: Either measure ID or code should be provided.

fields.name: code
fields.description: The code identifying the type of observation made on individuals in a population.
fields.notes: Codes should be reflect codes for observations on individuals. For example, the incidence of fever in a group should use the code SNOMED 426000000 (Fever greater than 100.4 Fahrenheit). The incidence of intubation in the group would use the SNOMED or CPT procedure code for intubation.

fields.name: measure_name
fields.description: The name of the measure or measure definition reported.
fields.notes: Either the name or the ID of the measure should be provided.

fields.name: measure_subject_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the group, provider, facility, or jurisdiction that the measure relates to.

fields.name: measure_datetime
fields.description: The time of the measure, if observed or calculated at a specific time.

fields.name: measure_period_start
fields.description: The date or date-time marking the beginning of the clinically-relevant time period of the measure.
fields.notes: Either the measure_datetime or the measure_period_start should be reported, but not both.

fields.name: measure_period_end
fields.description: The date or date-time marking end of the measure period. If the measure_period_start is reported and the measure_period_end is not reported, the measure is assumed to be ongoing at the time of reporting.

fields.name: result_quantity
fields.description: The value associated with the measure, represented as a number. The number can be either an integer or a float.

fields.name: result_units
fields.description: Unit of measure for the associated with the lab result quantity.
fields.notes: Nomenclature conforms to the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM): https://unitsofmeasure.org/trac

fields.name: result_numerator
fields.description: The numerator value associated with a ratio observation, represented as an integer.

fields.name: result_denominator
fields.description: The denominator value associated with a ratio observation, represented as an integer.

fields.name: measure_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the measure.

fields.name: measure_name
fields.description: The name of the measure defined.

fields.name: measure_description
fields.description: Description of the measure.

fields.name: last_changed
fields.description: The date the measure definition was last changed.

fields.name: scoring
fields.description: The way the measure is scored.

fields.name: inclusion_definition
fields.description: Refers to the initial set of patients, facilities, or events to be evaluated by a measure.

fields.name: denominator_definition
fields.description: The lower portion of a fraction used to calculate a rate, proportion, or ratio. The denominator can be the same as the inclusion, or a subset of the inclusions to further constrain the population for the purpose of the measure.

fields.name: numerator_definition
fields.description: The upper portion of a fraction used to calculate a rate, proportion, or ratio. Also called the measure focus, it is the target process, condition, event, or outcome. Numerator criteria are the processes or outcomes expected for item defined in the denominator.

fields.name: measure_population
fields.description: Measure population criteria define the patients or events for which the individual observation for the measure should be taken. Measure populations are used for continuous variable measures rather than numerator and denominator criteria.
